hasDitaContent.@value: Both phenazone and trimethoprim can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  phenazone  and  trimethoprim  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both phenazone and trimethoprim can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  phenazone  and  trimethoprim  can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasDitaContent.@value: Both phenazone and trimipramine can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  phenazone  and  trimipramine  can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Urokinase causes bleeding, as can phenazone ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Urokinase   causes   bleeding, as can   phenazone   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both phenazone and valaciclovir can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  phenazone  and  valaciclovir  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both phenazone and valganciclovir can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  phenazone  and  valganciclovir  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both phenazone and valsartan can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  phenazone  and  valsartan  can increase the risk of hyperkalaemia (hyperkalaemia is particularly notable when ACE inhibitors or angiotensin-II receptor antagonists are given with spironolactone or eplerenone).

hasDitaContent.@value: Both phenazone and vancomycin can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  phenazone  and  vancomycin  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Both phenazone and venlafaxine can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  phenazone  and  venlafaxine  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Phenazone causes bleeding, as can volanesorsen ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet countconsult product literature.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Phenazone   causes   bleeding, as can   volanesorsen   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises avoid depending on platelet countconsult product literature .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both phenazone and vortioxetine can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  phenazone  and  vortioxetine  can increase the risk of bleeding.

hasDitaContent.@value: Warfarin causes bleeding, as can phenazone ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect. Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Warfarin   causes   bleeding, as can   phenazone   ; concurrent use might increase the risk of developing this effect .  Manufacturer advises use with caution or avoid .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both phenazone and xipamide can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  phenazone  and  xipamide  can increase the risk of hyponatraemia.

hasDitaContent.@value: Phenazone increases the risk of acute renal failure when given with xipamide. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Phenazone   increases   the risk of acute renal failure when given with   xipamide .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both phenazone and zidovudine can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  phenazone  and  zidovudine  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasDitaContent.@value: Zidovudine increases the risk of haematological toxicity when given with phenazone. Manufacturer makes no recommendation.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Zidovudine   increases   the risk of haematological toxicity when given with   phenazone .  Manufacturer makes no recommendation .

hasDitaContent.@value: Both phenazone and zoledronate can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.

hasMessage.hasTextContent: Both  phenazone  and  zoledronate  can increase the risk of nephrotoxicity.
